title: 12 Days of 1337mas, as Performed by the Pilford Squadron Seasonal Choral Group
lyrics: So very recently, as in last year, we started a new Hearth's Warming tradition, as it were. And, uh, no one asked for it back, but we're doing it again anyway. So I'd like to invite the, uh, Pilford Squadron Seasonal Choral Group up so we can do "12 days of 1337tmas".
On the first day of 1337mas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
On the second day of 1337mas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
On the third day of 1337mas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
On the fourth day of L33Tmas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
On the fifth day of 1337mas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
On the sixth day of 1337mas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
On the *Seven*th day of 1337mas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
On the eighth day of 1337mas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
On the ninth day of 1337mas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
On the tenth day of 1337mas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
On the eleventh day of 1337mas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
On the twelfth day of 1337mas, my pilfling gave to me
A shadow in a Vronut tree
If you know what I mean
